00070 static orxINLINE void orx_Init()
00071 {
00072   /* retrieve orx cmd-line arguments */
00073   orxAndroid_GetMainArgs();
00074 
00075   /* Call main function */
00076   main(s32NbParams,azParams);
00077 }

00079 static orxINLINE orxBOOL orx_Step()
00080 {
00081   orxSTATUS eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00082   orxBOOL   bStop;
00083   
00084   /* Sends frame start event */
00085   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &sstPayload);
00086 
00087   /* Runs the engine */
00088   eMainStatus = spfnRun();
00089 
00090   /* Updates clock system */
00091   eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00092 
00093   /* Sends frame stop event */
00094   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &sstPayload);
00095 
00096   /* Updates frame counter */
00097   sstPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00098 
00099   /* Updates stop condition */
00100   bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
00101 
00102   /* Done! */
00103   return bStop;
00104 }
00105 
00106 static orxINLINE void orx_Exit()
00107 {
00108   /* Removes event handler */
00109   orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00110 
00111   /* Exits from engine */
00112   orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00113 
00114   /* Exits from all modules */
00115   orxModule_ExitAll();
00116 
00117   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00118   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00119   
00120   /* free cmd-line arguments */
00121   orxAndroid_ReleaseMainArgs();
00122 }

00143 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_init(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj, jobject activity, jint s32width, jint s32height)
00144 {
00145   s32DisplayWidth = s32width;
00146   s32DisplayHeight = s32height;
00147   
00148   /* save env and activity */
00149   poJEnv = env;
00150   #ifdef __cplusplus
00151     oActivity = env->NewGlobalRef(activity);
00152   #else /* __cplusplus */
00153     oActivity = (*env)->NewGlobalRef(env, activity);
00154   #endif /* __cplusplus */
00155   
00156   orx_Init();
00157 }

00159 JNIEXPORT jboolean JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_step(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj)
00160 {
00161   return (orx_Step() == orxTRUE ? JNI_FALSE : JNI_TRUE);
00162 }

00165 {
00166   
00167   orx_Exit();
00168   
00169   /* release oActivity reference */
00170 #ifdef __cplusplus
00171   env->DeleteGlobalRef(oActivity);
00172 #else
00173   (*env)->DeleteGlobalRef(env, oActivity);
00174 #endif
00175 }

00192 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_onNativeTouch(JNIEnv* env, jobject obj, jint iAction, jint iActionPointer, jint iPointerCount, jintArray aiIdList,  jfloatArray afXList, jfloatArray afYList, jfloatArray afPressureList)
00193 {
00194   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00195 
00196   /* Inits event's type */
00197   orxSYSTEM_EVENT android_event;
00198   switch (iAction) {
00199   case 0:
00200     android_event = orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_BEGIN;
00201     break;
00202   case 1:
00203     android_event = orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_MOVE;
00204     break;
00205   case 2:
00206     android_event = orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_END;
00207     break;
00208   default:
00209     //error.....
00210     return;
00211   }
00212 
00213   /* Inits event's payload */
00214   stPayload.stTouch.iPointerCount = iPointerCount;
00215   stPayload.stTouch.iActionPointer= iActionPointer;
00216 
00217   /* Get array from Java environment */
00218 #ifdef __cplusplus
00219   stPayload.stTouch.aiIdList = env->GetIntArrayElements(aiIdList, NULL);
00220   stPayload.stTouch.afXList = env->GetFloatArrayElements(afXList, NULL);
00221   stPayload.stTouch.afYList = env->GetFloatArrayElements(afYList, NULL);
00222   stPayload.stTouch.afPressureList = env->GetFloatArrayElements(afPressureList, NULL);
00223 #else /* __cplusplus */
00224   stPayload.stTouch.aiIdList = (*env)->GetIntArrayElements(env, aiIdList, NULL);
00225   stPayload.stTouch.afXList = (*env)->GetFloatArrayElements(env, afXList, NULL);
00226   stPayload.stTouch.afYList = (*env)->GetFloatArrayElements(env, afYList, NULL);
00227   stPayload.stTouch.afPressureList = (*env)->GetFloatArrayElements(env, afPressureList, NULL);
00228 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00229 
00230   /* Sends it */
00231   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, android_event, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00232 
00233   /* Clear java arrays */
00234 #ifdef __cplusplus
00235   env->ReleaseIntArrayElements(aiIdList,stPayload.stTouch.aiIdList, 0);
00236   env->ReleaseFloatArrayElements(afXList, stPayload.stTouch.afXList, 0);
00237   env->ReleaseFloatArrayElements(afYList, stPayload.stTouch.afYList, 0);
00238   env->ReleaseFloatArrayElements(afPressureList, stPayload.stTouch.afPressureList, 0);
00239 #else /* __cplusplus */
00240   (*env)->ReleaseIntArrayElements(env, aiIdList,stPayload.stTouch.aiIdList, 0);   
00241   (*env)->ReleaseFloatArrayElements(env, afXList, stPayload.stTouch.afXList, 0);   
00242   (*env)->ReleaseFloatArrayElements(env, afYList, stPayload.stTouch.afYList, 0);   
00243   (*env)->ReleaseFloatArrayElements(env, afPressureList, stPayload.stTouch.afPressureList, 0);
00244 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00245 }
00246 
00247 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_onNativeAccel(JNIEnv* env, jobject obj, jfloat x, jfloat y, jfloat z)
00248 {
00249   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00250 
00251   /* Inits event's payload */
00252   orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00253   stPayload.stAccelerometer.pAccelerometer = orxNULL;
00254   stPayload.stAccelerometer.fX = (orxFLOAT) x;
00255   stPayload.stAccelerometer.fY = (orxFLOAT) y;
00256   stPayload.stAccelerometer.fZ = (orxFLOAT) z;
00257 
00258   /* Sends it */
00259   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00260 }

00281 extern struct android_app *pstApp;
00282 extern void (*ptonAppCmd)(struct android_app *app, int32_t cmd);
00283 extern int32_t (*ptonInputEvent)(struct android_app* app, AInputEvent* event);
00284 extern const ASensor *poAccelerometerSensor;

00295 static orxINLINE void orx_AndroidExecute(struct android_app *_pstApp, const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00296 {
00297   /* Checks */
00298   orxASSERT(_pstApp != orxNULL);
00299   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00300 
00301   /* Inits app */
00302   pstApp                = _pstApp;
00303   pstApp->onAppCmd      = ptonAppCmd;
00304   pstApp->onInputEvent  = ptonInputEvent;
00305   
00306   /* Makes sure glue isn't stripped */
00307   app_dummy();
00308 
00309   /* Inits the Debug System */
00310   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00311 
00312   /* Retrieves Java environment */
00313   orxAndroid_AttachThread();
00314   orxAndroid_GetMainArgs();
00315 
00316   /* Registers main module */
00317   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00318 
00319   /* Registers all other modules */
00320   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00321 
00322   /* Calls all modules setup */
00323   orxModule_SetupAll();
00324 
00325   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00326   if(orxParam_SetArgs(s32NbParams, azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00327   {
00328     /* Inits the engine */
00329     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00330     {
00331       /* Registers default event handler */
00332       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00333 
00334       /* Displays help */
00335       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00336       {
00337         orxSTATUS eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00338         orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00339         orxBOOL   bStop;
00340 
00341         /* Clears payload */
00342         orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00343 
00344         /* Main loop */
00345         for(bStop = orxFALSE, sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00346             bStop == orxFALSE;
00347             bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE)
00348         {
00349           /* Reads all pending events */
00350           orxS32 s32Ident, s32Events;
00351           struct android_poll_source *pstSource;
00352 
00353           /* For all system events */
00354           while((s32Ident = ALooper_pollAll(((s32Animating != 0) || (pstApp->destroyRequested != 0)) ? 0 : -1, NULL, (int *)&s32Events, (void **)&pstSource)) >= 0)
00355           {
00356              /* Valid source? */
00357              if(pstSource != NULL)
00358              {
00359                /* Process its event */
00360                pstSource->process(pstApp, pstSource);
00361              }
00362 
00363             /* If a sensor has data, process it now */
00364             if(s32Ident == LOOPER_ID_USER)
00365             {
00366               /* Has accelerometer? */
00367               if(poAccelerometerSensor != NULL)
00368               {
00369                 orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stAccelPayload;
00370                 ASensorEvent            oEvent;
00371 
00372                 /* Inits event's payload */
00373                 orxMemory_Zero(&stAccelPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00374 
00375                 /* For all accelerometer events */
00376                 while(ASensorEventQueue_getEvents(poSensorEventQueue, &oEvent, 1) > 0)
00377                 {
00378                   /* Inits event */
00379                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.pAccelerometer = &oEvent;
00380                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.fX = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.x;
00381                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.fY = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.y;
00382                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.fZ = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.z;
00383 
00384                   /* Sends event */
00385                   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stAccelPayload);
00386                 }
00387               }
00388             }
00389           }
00390 
00391           /* Should update? */
00392           if((s32Animating != 0) || (pstApp->destroyRequested != 0))
00393           {
00394             /* Sends frame start event */
00395             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00396 
00397             /* Runs the engine */
00398             eMainStatus = _pfnRun();
00399 
00400             /* Updates clock system */
00401             eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00402 
00403             /* Sends frame stop event */
00404             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00405 
00406             /* Updates frame counter */
00407             stPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00408           }
00409         }
00410       }
00411 
00412       /* Removes event handler */
00413       orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00414 
00415       /* Exits from engine */
00416       orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00417     }
00418 
00419     /* Exits from all modules */
00420     orxModule_ExitAll();
00421   }
00422   
00423   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00424   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00425 
00426   orxAndroid_ReleaseMainArgs();
00427   orxAndroid_DetachThread();
00428 }
